name: shared-types
description: Generated TypeScript types for Callisto protocol

scripts.typegen: json2ts -i ../../../schema/ws/protocol.json -o src/protocol.d.ts && json2ts -i ../../../schema/ws/server-message.json -o src/server-message.d.ts && json2ts -i ../../../schema/ws/client-message.json -o src/client-message.d.ts
